entry.title: Cooling gets cooler: Cooling all 6 degrees of motion

link.title: Cooling gets cooler: Cooling all 6 degrees of motion

entry.content:
Cooling Gets Cooler

Cooling all 6 degrees of motion

Our senior postdoc Dr. Antonio Pontin and his team’s recent success in simultaneously cooling a non-spherical particle’s all six degrees of freedom has been published in Nature Physics today. Click here to find out more about it.
entry.summary: Cooling Gets Cooler Cooling all 6 degrees of motion
